items.title: Three-front war, one new lever
items.text: AI raised expectations, collapsed channels, and intensified competition, so growth shifted to trust.

items.title: Trust-based acquisition replaces broken channels
items.text: SEO, SEM, and corporate social weakened; employee voices, creators, community, and product built word of mouth.

items.title: Trust-based retention becomes the moat
items.text: AI commoditized cheaper and faster value props, so retention depended on confidence in ongoing outcomes.
